name: Young Love
content: You're a young woman cast aside
For the young lovers  taking the hill
When the wine pours we raise our cups
And now that I love you  oh oh
For the young lovers  taking the hill
When the wine pours we raise our cups
And it scares me to let it go
For the young lovers  taking the hill
When the wine pours we raise our cups
For the young lovers  taking the hill
When the wine pours we raise our cups
